item.title: Solana Ecosystem NFT Trading Platform Collector Crypt Surpasses $145 Million in Total Volume, Protocol's Gross Revenue Exceeds $9.65 Million
item.description: On September 3rd, based on @zkayape's Dune Analytics dashboard, the entity card trading platform Collector Crypt within the Solana ecosystem has accumulated a total trading volume of more than $1.45 billion and a protocol gross revenue of over $9.65 million.As of the time of writing, the platform's token CARDS is currently trading at $0.16, with a 24-hour increase of 630%.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum spot ETF saw a net outflow of $1.353 billion, while the Bitcoin spot ETF saw a net inflow of $3.32 billion.
item.description: September 3rd. Farside Investors reported that a net outflow of $135.3 million occurred for the US Ethereum spot ETF yesterday. There was no inflow or outflow for BlackRock's ETHA, and a net outflow of $99.2 million for Fidelity.Yesterday, the Bitcoin spot ETF witnessed a net inflow of $332 million. BlackRock's IBIT had a net inflow of $72.9 million, and Fidelity had a net inflow of $132.7 million.

item.title: Linea Ecosystem DEX Protocol Etherex (REX) Surpasses $0.5, with a 23% Increase in 24 Hours
item.description: On September 3rd, based on market data, Linea's ecosystem DEX protocol Etherex (REX) has exceeded $0.5 and is currently priced at $0.5189, with a 24-hour price increase of 23%.Previously, Linea announced the launch of the Ignition liquidity incentive program and distributed 1 billion LINEA tokens as rewards. Etherex, Aave, and Euler are designated partners for this event.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem Entity Card Trading Platform Collector Crypt Token Surges Over 470% in a Single Day, Market Cap Exceeds $45 Million
item.description: On September 3rd, based on the GMGN market information available at GMGN, the token CARDS of the Solana ecosystem entity card trading platform Collector Crypt witnessed a daily growth of more than 470%. Its circulating market capitalization exceeded $45 million, and the coin price currently stands at $0.1247. The 24-hour trading volume of this token is over $20.4 million.BlockBeats alerts users that the price of the related token is highly volatile, and users should exercise caution when investing.

item.title: 「ETH Maximalist Whale」 Whale Further Increases Position, High-leverage Long Causes Over $25M Loss in Past Week
item.description: On September 3rd, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, the "ETH Ironhead Bull Army", which is a whale with an address beginning with 0xa5232, has once again increased its long position in ETH by approximately $1.69 million in value within the past 2 hours. Currently, the total size of the whale's long position is $158 million, with an unrealized loss of $6.33 million and a liquidation price of around $4099.The whale has been bullish on the ETH trend recently and has been continuously adding to its long position for several weeks. However, due to always entering positions at high prices, it has suffered heavy losses recently, losing more than $25 million just in the past week.

item.title: The timing of some economic data releases in the United States this week has been adjusted, but the Nonfarm Payrolls data release time remains unchanged.
item.description: On September 3rd, because the U.S. Labor Day holiday is on September 1st, the release timing of some U.S. economic data has been postponed. The U.S. weekly API and EIA crude oil inventory data will be respectively postponed to be released at 04:30 on September 4th (Thursday) and 00:00 on September 5th (Friday). The U.S. August "small nonfarm" ADP employment numbers will be postponed to be released at 20:15 on September 4th (Thursday). The U.S. August nonfarm employment data will still be released at 20:30 on September 5th (Friday). Please pay attention, all investors. (FXStreet)

item.title: A whale went long on SOL with 20x leverage, liquidation price $195.19
item.description: On September 3rd, as per the data from LookOnChain, a whale transferred 1 million USDC into Hyperliquid and took a long position on SOL with a leverage of 20x. Their position volume reached: 48,000 SOL tokens ($10.13 million), and the liquidation price was $195.19.

item.title: Impacted by Binance's delisting announcement, the related token experienced a sharp drop, with BAKE plunging over 34% in less than half an hour.
item.description: On September 3rd, based on HTX market information, due to the news of being delisted from Binance, BAKE saw a plummet of over 34% in less than half an hour and is now trading at $0.0517.SLF dropped by more than 33% in less than half an hour and is currently trading at $0.04.HIFI fell by over 18% in less than half an hour and is now trading at $0.0832.

item.title: 「Trump Fires Fed Board Member Powell Case」 to be Defended by Washington Legal Legend Abbe Lowell on behalf of Powell
item.description: On September 3rd, the "Case of Trump Firing Fed Chair Powell" will be defended by Abbe Lowell, a legendary lawyer in Washington, on behalf of Powell.It is reported that Lowell's past clients have included New York Attorney General Letitia James, Hunter Biden, Jared Kushner, Ivanka Trump, and many other high-profile political figures, regardless of their party affiliations (whether they are Republicans or Democrats).For Lowell, facing a presidential administration's attempt to control the actions of a federal regulatory agency is not a new situation. He has been deeply involved in the Washington legal community for decades. Lowell stated in an MSNBC interview last month, "I have basically challenged the overreach of every government agency in every administration since Ronald Reagan. Whether it is a Democratic or Republican government, if the government overreaches, it is the duty of a lawyer to bring it back on track." (Golden Finance)

item.title: The SEC met with Robinhood yesterday to discuss security token trading and other Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization issues.
item.description: On September 3rd, the cryptocurrency working group of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission met with Robinhood on September 2nd to have discussions on regulatory issues related to crypto assets. The discussions encompassed trading tokenized securities and non-securities crypto assets, as well as considerations for tokenizing traditional securities in accordance with different regulations.
